Probably the weakest IRS album but still very solid. I'd say the best songs on it are Feeling Gravitys Pull, Driver 8, Auctioneer, Green Grow the Rushes, and Cant Get There from Here (honorable mention: Life and How to Live It). Despite some very impressive highs it's brought down because of three tracks that can't get into at all, these being Kohoutek, Old Man Kensey, and Maps and Legends. I'd rank it a 3.5/5.
Oh, and one other thing: The B-side to Driver 8, Crazy, is stellar.
